publisher.name: Civilisations et Littératures d'Espagne et d'Amérique du Moyen Âge aux Lumières (CLEA) - Paris Sorbonne

conditions.condition: This publisher's policies have not been checked by RoMEO.
DOAJ says it is an open access journal, but this may only mean that it is freely available to read.
Most open access publishers also permit self-archiving and re-use, but some do not.
Do not assume that self-archiving is allowed, unless it is published under a Creative Commons license.
Please contact the publisher for further information if necessary
Email romeo@jisc.ac.uk if you wish to suggest adding this publisher properly to RoMEO.
